member.name: T:TimeZoneNames.TZNames
member.summary: Provides methods for getting localized names of time zones, and related functionality.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetTimeZoneIdsForCountry(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of IANA time zone identifiers for a specific country.
member.param: The two character ISO 3166 country code.
member.returns: An array of IANA time zone identifiers.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetTimeZoneIdsForCountry(System.String,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Gets an array of IANA time zone identifiers for a specific country.
member.param: The two character ISO 3166 country code.
A point in time to filter to. The resulting list will only contain zones that differ after this point.
member.returns: An array of IANA time zone identifiers.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetTimeZonesForCountry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and their corresponding localized display names, for a specific country. The results are suitable to populate a user-facing time zone selection control.
member.param: The two character ISO 3166 country code.
The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
member.returns: A dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and localized display names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetTimeZonesForCountry(System.String,System.String,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Gets an dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and their corresponding localized display names, for a specific country. The results are suitable to populate a user-facing time zone selection control.
member.param: The two character ISO 3166 country code.
The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
A point in time to filter to. The resulting list will only contain zones that differ after this point.
member.returns: A dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and localized display names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetFixedTimeZoneIds
member.summary: Gets a list of IANA time zone identifiers that represent a fixed offset from UTC, including UTC itself. Note that time zones of the form Etc/GMT[+/-]n use an inverted sign from the usual conventions.
member.returns: A list of IANA time zone identifiers.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetFixedTimeZoneNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers that represent a fixed offset from UTC, including UTC itself, along with the corresponding localized display name. Note that time zones of the form Etc/GMT[+/-]n use an inverted sign from the usual conventions.
member.param: The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
member.returns: A dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and localized display names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetFixedTimeZoneAbbreviations(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers that represent a fixed offset from UTC, including UTC itself, along with the corresponding abbreviation, localized when possible. Note that time zones of the form Etc/GMT[+/-]n use an inverted sign from the usual conventions.
member.param: The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the abbreviations.
member.returns: A dictionary of IANA time zone identifiers and abbreviations.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetNamesForTimeZone(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the localized names for a given IANA or Windows time zone identifier.
member.param: An IANA or Windows time zone identifier.
The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
member.returns: A object containing the localized generic, standard, and daylight names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetAbbreviationsForTimeZone(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the abbreviations for a given IANA or Windows time zone identifier, localizing them when possible.
member.param: An IANA or Windows time zone identifier.
The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the abbreviations.
member.returns: A object containing the localized generic, standard, and daylight abbreviations.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetCountryNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a dictionary of ISO 3166 country codes and their corresponding localized names.
member.param: The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the country names.
member.returns: A dictionary of country codes and names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetDisplayNameForTimeZone(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the localized names for a given IANA or Windows time zone identifier.
member.param: An IANA or Windows time zone identifier.
The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
member.returns: A display name associated with this time zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetDisplayNames(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get display names suitable for use in a single drop-down list to select a time zone.
member.param: The IETF language tag (culture code) to use when localizing the display names.
true to use IANA time zone keys, otherwise uses Windows time zone keys.
member.returns: A dictionary where the key is the time zone id, and the name is the localized display name.

member.name: M:TimeZoneNames.TZNames.GetLanguageCodes
member.summary: Gets a list of all language codes supported by this library.
